entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0154.10068] The filer has reported a value for foreign-derived intangible income that is not using the element defined in the US-GAAP taxonomy. The FASB has added elements for the FDII percentage amount and the FDII monetary amount in the 2022 taxonomy. These elements are:
1. EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationFdiiPercent 2. EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationFdiiAmount
The element us-gaap:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxContingenciesStateAndLocal with the label "Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation Foreign Derived Intangible Income Deduction, Percent" has been used in the filing in the disclosure section "9955553 - Disclosure - INCOME TAXES - Effective Income Tax Rate Reconcilliation (Details)" that should be updated to the appropriate US-GAAP element listed above.
Rule Element Id:10068 Rule version: 26.0.9 -
